nodes.text: Kronex spaceport was a considerably large spaceport in the Llon Nebulae that served its visitors with a variety of cantinas.

The Storm Fleet made a stop in the spaceport during the Clone Wars. Two Jedi, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker, used their local contact Fizz to covertly learn the purpose and destination of the fleet.
